quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Heroes and Project Runway

What Emmy Award-winning American actor plays this condemned man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis Weaver

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dylan Hunt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Parsons New School for Design in New York City

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heidi Klum
